title: ip problem
body: at what lvl do i start getting ip im lvl 4 or 5

replies.body: You should be getting IP for joining matchmade games, even coop vs. AI, per the [IP Breakdown ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752824-Reward-IP-XP-System-Breakdown)guide.   It looks like you've got a pretty solid amount of IP so far from what I see.  Is it showing as 0 for you?  Let me now!
nvm i log back in and got the ip
